vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξαστράπτω,
flash as with lightning, [LXX+NT]; of the sun's light, Zos.Alch.[Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to flash like lightning
primarily to flash forth; hence, to glisten as lightning, Lk. 9:29*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 閃電般的閃爍, 發亮照耀, 光芒四射
1a)喻意: 指白色衣袍 (路 9:29)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 闪电般的闪烁, 发亮照耀, 光芒四射
1a)喻意: 指白色衣袍 (路 9:29)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chói lòa; chói sáng. ἐκ (G1537) + ἀστράπτω (G797)
